content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Update test names in tool_generator.rs: rename test_extract_entity_from_response() to test_spawned_entity_id()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating test names
Update test names in tool_generator.rs: rename test_extract_entity_from_response_missing() to test_spawned_entity_id_missing()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating remaining test names
Add documentation to BevyResponseExtractor methods explaining the difference between count() and entity_count()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding documentation
Add documentation to McpCallExtractor methods explaining when to use each method
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding MCP extractor documentation
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review focusing on duplication, complexity, and validating the implementation was correct
When code review subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
